lead_paragraph: Coach Jeff Fisher lashed out at critics of the Tennessee Titans’ dealings with Billy Volek, saying yesterday that Volek lied to him and never took advantage of the opportunity to be the starter. The Titans traded Volek on Tuesday to the San Diego Chargers for a sixth-round draft pick that could become a fifth-rounder depending on playing time. Fisher said Volek asked to be traded the day the Titans signed Kerry Collins last month. The Titans are 0-2 with Collins.
